lines.text: Love is stronger than death. Your scriptures say so.
We did not invent love. It has its order, its law.
He is not the master of love. He is love itself. If you would love, don't place yourself beyond love's reach.
I was so disappointed I had to lean against the wall.
I said to her, "Peace be with you," and she'd received that peace on her knees. What wonder, that one can give what one doesn't possess! Oh, miracle of our empty hands!

Make order. Make order all day long. Make order while thinking that disorder will take over the following day, because it is precisely within order, unfortunately, that the night will blow away yesterday's work.
The simplest tasks are by no means the easiest.
Our hidden sins poison the air that others breathe.
